title: (BONUS EP) F*cked Up Fandom
description:
This week, the gals explore the weird world of passions gone wrong. Topics include Sherlock Holmes's biggest fans, a guy who watched Taxi Driver a few too many times, and a very arrogant poet. Get yourself a bottle of Apothic Red, do not accept any duel challenges, and tune in for F*cked Up Fandom.

For a full list of show sponsors, visit https://wineandcrimepodcast.com/sponsors/
